Endpoints.salesorderbyagent: SalesOrderHeadersV2?$filter=CreatorId eq {0} and dataAreaId eq 'cpl' &$select=SalesOrderNumber,CreatorId,SalesOrderName,InvoiceCustomerAccountNumber,SalesAgentLongitude,SalesAgentLatitude,CreatedOn&$orderby=CreatedOn desc
